message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell me the product. I would like to counteroffer at $95.
Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to counteroffer at $100.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go down to $100, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $108.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $105.
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $109.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $107.
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my offers. I would like to counteroffer at $105.
